description.surface: Brise la timeline pour attaquer depuis plusieurs moments simultanément
description.deep: Sort cosmique qui fracture le temps pour permettre des attaques multi-temporelles
description.ford_truth: Time is a flat circle. This spell makes it a shattered mirror.

primary.name: Multi-Temporal Strike
primary.description: Attack arrives from 5 different temporal positions
primary.visual: Multiple versions of caster appear and attack

secondary.name: Temporal Echo
secondary.description: Each hit creates a temporal echo that may repeat

tertiary.name: Causality Confusion
tertiary.description: Target becomes confused about what happened when
tertiary.effect: Target skips next turn due to temporal disorientation
tertiary.ford_insight: Confusion is often more effective than damage

ford_signature.name: Temporal Architect's Touch
ford_signature.description: Ford's mastery allows perfect temporal coordination
ford_signature.effect: All hits guaranteed to connect if Ford approves

fracture_points.name: Past Fracture
fracture_points.special: Gains knowledge of target's past actions

fracture_points.name: Future Fracture
fracture_points.special: May prevent target's next planned action

fracture_points.name: Observer Fracture
fracture_points.special: Ford observes and judges the attack

apprentice.ford_comment: You're beginning to see time as I do.

journeyman.ford_comment: Better. Time bends to your will.

temporal_architect.special_ability: Can attack targets in their own past

risks_and_warnings.paradox_risk: High - attacking across time creates causal loops
risks_and_warnings.temporal_backlash: Failed casting may trap caster in time loop

lore.origin: Ford's solution to the problem of linear narrative
lore.westworld_connection: Used to create complex, overlapping storylines
lore.philosophy: Time is not a river, but a web that can be rewoven
lore.ford_teaching: True power comes from understanding time's malleability

visual_effects.fracture_moment: Reality cracks like glass around target
visual_effects.multi_hit: Attacks arrive from impossible angles and times
visual_effects.ford_observation: Ford's silhouette briefly visible in fracture pattern

temporal_weaving.description: Combine multiple fractures for enhanced effect
temporal_weaving.effect: Damage multiplied by number of active fractures

causality_loop.effect: Attack strengthens itself through time loop

ford_synchronization.description: Synchronize with Ford's own temporal perception
